short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the text 'videogames' with 'video games' the way the author no doubt intended.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We all know 'video games' is properly spelled as two words. Some people just accidentally write it as if it's a compound word. This extension simply corrects that mistake for them, sparing you any uncomfortable discussions with your favorite web authors.
